text:
@nowthisnews @AOC AOC dazzlingly explains why we shouldn't have a multitude of low-skilled,welfare-dependent illegal aliens in our country.
Her district is the perfect example.
This is literally a threat to our nation's safety.

#LockdownWithoutPlan #MAGA2020 #FamiliesFirst #America #COVID19
